question_text: Which of the following best explains why an organization might choose a private cloud over a public cloud?
answer_options: To take advantage of third-party scalability
To reduce operational control and oversight
To improve security and retain data sovereignty
To eliminate the need for in-house IT staff
correct_answer: To improve security and retain data sovereignty
explanation: Organizations with strict compliance or data privacy requirements often choose private clouds for better control and data residency guarantees.
